title: Region bounded by algebraic f and line part - b

content.description: Let f be the function given by  \(f\left(x\right)=\frac{x^3}{4}-\frac{x^2}{3}-\frac{x}{2}+3\cos x\). Let R be the shaded region in the second quadrant bounded by the graph of f, and let S be the shaded region bounded by the graph of f and line ℓ, the line tangent to the graph of f at x = 0, as shown above.
content.question: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y=-2.

frqParts.text: Find the volume of the solid generated when R is rotated about the horizontal line y=-2.

topic.text: 8.12: Volume with Washer Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
